Register.title: Partner Account Creation
Register.subTitle: Create an account to register and manage accommodations.

RegisterContactDetails.title: Contact Information
RegisterContactDetails.subTitle: To secure your Staying.com account, we need your full name and phone number.

RegisterPassword.title: Create Password
RegisterPassword.subTitle: Use at least 10 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, and numbers.

Forgot.title: Forgot Password?
Forgot.subTitle: Please confirm your username, and we'll send you a link to reset your password.

ForgotConfirmation.title: Check Your Inbox
ForgotConfirmation.subTitle1: We've sent you instructions and a password reset link to
ForgotConfirmation.subTitle2: This email may take a few minutes to arrive in your inbox.

CheckEmail.title: Check your inbox
CheckEmail.subTitle1: We've just emailed a verification link to
CheckEmail.subTitle2: Once it arrives, it will be valid for 15 minutes.

Banner.title: We hope you’ll enjoy your stay
Banner.subTitle: Discover our world-class hotel & restaurant resort.

JoinBanner.title: Whether hosting is your side passion or full-time job, register your holiday rental on Staying.com to reach travellers worldwide

items.item1: 45% of partners get their first booking within a week
items.item2: More than 1,1 billion holiday rental guests since 2024
items.item3: Full control over your property and finances
items.item4: Registration is free and takes 15 minutes

WordMap.title: Reach a unique global customer base

items.item1: of holiday rental guests return to book with us again
items.item2: of nights booked on Staying.com in 2022 were for international stays
items.item3: of holiday rental customers are Genius loyalty level 2 or 3 who tend to spend more per booking

Category.title: List your property on Staying.com and start welcoming guests in no time!
Category.subTitle: To get started, choose the type of property you want to list on Staying.com

item1.name: Apartment
item1.description: Furnished and self-catering accommodation, where guests rent the entire place.

item2.name: Homes
item2.description: Properties like apartments, holiday homes, villas, etc.

item3.name: Hotel, B&Bs, and more
item3.description: Properties like hotels, B&Bs, guest houses, hostels, aparthotels, etc.

item4.name: Alternative places
item4.description: Properties like boats, campsites, luxury tents, etc.

Property.title: From the list below, which property category is most similar to your place?

Owner.title: How many hotels are you listing?

items.item1: One hotel with one or multiple rooms that guests can book
items.item2: Multiple hotels with one or multiple rooms that guests can book

FeedBack.title: You're listing?
FeedBack.subTitle: Dose this sound like your property?
FeedBack.needChange: No, I need to make a change

information.name: Basic Information
information.title: Hello
information.subTitle: Please start by telling us your room's name, address and contact details.

information.hotelName: What's the name of your hotel?
information.subHotelName: Guests will see this name when searching for a place to stay.
information.subContactPerson: Contact name so we can know your name.
information.subPhoneNumber: Contact phone number so we can support your registration when needed
information.nameRanting: What is the star rating of your hotel?
information.nameMultipleHotel: Do you own multiple hotels, or are part of a chain or management company?

noti1.title: What needs to be included in my address?

items.item1: Include both your street name and number for the entire property
items.item2: The floor number in address line 2 if relevant
items.item3: Individual apartment or floor numbers can be shared later
items.item6: Use the physical address of the property, not your office or home address

noti2.title: Why do I need to add my address?

items.item1: Once a guest books your property, this is the address that will be shared with them. It's important that it's correct so guests can easily find your property.

composition.name: Composition And Price
composition.subTitle: Please choose us to know your first room. After entering all the necessary information. Location will be able to enter details for other rooms.

information.subOptionalName: Create your own custom name for your reference (not required).
information.titlePrice: How much do you want to charge per night?

commissions.title: commission
commissions.save: Save time with automatically confirmed bookings
commissions.we: We promote your place on Google

noti1.title: Do you offer other sleeping arrangements?

items.item1: Right now, you just need to add your basic sleeping arrangements.
items.item2: Cots, additional beds and other sleeping arrangements can be added in the extranet, the platform you’ll use to manage your property.
items.item3: You can set up your property’s child policies, including maximum age and price adjustments, in the extranet after you finish registration.

noti2.title: What if I'm not sure about my price?

items.item1: Don't worry, you can always change it later. You can even set weekend, midweek and seasonal prices, giving you more control over what you earn.

amenities.name: Amenities
amenities.subTitle: Please tell us some convenient information such as amenities and internet that the website uses.

information.numberOfExtraBed: Select the number of extra beds that can be added
information.check: Check the box if you allow the following guests to sleep in extra beds.
information.childrenOfCrib: Children up to 2 years old sleep in a crib
information.priceChildren: Enter the price per night per child
information.priceAdult: Enter the price per night per adult

noti1.title: What if I don’t see a facility I offer?

items.item1: The facilities listed here are the ones guests search for most. After you complete your registration, you can add more facilities from a larger list on the Extranet, the platform you'll use to manage your property.

photo.name: Photos
photo.title: What dose your hotel look like?
photo.subTitle: Beautiful images are an enticing invitation to a complete hotel experience, download high resolution images and show exactly what your hotel has to offer, We will display them on your property page on Staying.com.

information.uploadPhoto: Upload at least 5 photos of your property.
information.moreUploadPhoto: The more you upload, the more likely you are to get bookings. You can add more later.
information.photoGood: that will make a good first impression.
information.clickAndDrag: Click and drag the photos to arrange them in the order you would like guests to see them.

noti1.title: What if I don't have professional photos?

items.item1: No problem! You can use a smartphone or a digital camera.Here are some tips for taking great photos of your property
items.item2: If you don’t know who took a photo, it's best to avoid using it. Only use photos others have taken if you have permission.

policies.name: Policies
policies.title: Cancellation policies
policies.subTitle: Please list basic policy details. Do you allow children or pets to stay? How flexible are you with cancellations?.

information.cancelBooking: When can the guests cancel their bookings for free?
information.before18: Before 18:00 on the day of arrival
information.before1day: Before 1 day on the day of arrival
information.before2day: Before 2 days on the day of arrival
information.before3day: Before 3 days on the day of arrival
information.before4day: Before 4 days on the day of arrival
information.before5day: Before 5 days on the day of arrival
information.priceCancelBooking: How much are your guests charged if they cancel after the cancellation window (before 18:00 on the day of arrival)?

items.item1: These policies can be easily updated later.

payment.name: Payments
payment.subTitle: Please indicate payment method. You accept the details along with the other options.

information.title: How can your guests pay you at your property?
information.subTitle1: In case you don’t accept credit cards at your property, Staying.com can facilitate your guest payments for you with the Payments by Staying.com service
information.payWithCredit: Guests can pay with a credit card at my property
information.payWithStaying: I’ll use Payments by Staying.com and I will pay no payment charge
information.subTitle2: In order to comply with various legal and regulatory requirements, we need to collect and verify some information about you and your property.
information.provideFullName: Please provide the full names of all individuals who own 25% or more of the accommodation.

items.item1: Your guest pays through Staying.com with more options like PayPal, WeChat Pay and AliPay.
items.item2: We facilitate your guest’s payment. You don’t have to deal with fraud, chargebacks or invalid cards.
items.item3: Staying.com sends payouts to you. You'll receive a bank transfer by the 15th of each month that covers all bookings with a check-out in the previous month.

confirm.name: Confirm
confirm.title: You accept the details provided by Staying.com.

information.title: You're almost done - just a few final notes.
information.subTitle1: To help you start earning revenue, we'll automatically open your property for booking over the next 12 months. If you want to change your room availability before opening, you can select 'complete registration and open later'. Availability can also be adjusted after you open a room for booking.
information.subTitle2: To complete registration, please check the boxes below:
information.acceptGeneralTermsPrivacy: I certify that the accommodation business is legal and has all necessary licenses and permits, available to present upon request. Staying.com B.V has the right to verify and investigate any information provided by you. issued upon registration.
information.certificationOfLegalBusinessOperations: I have read and accept and agree to the general terms and the Staying.com Safety and Security Policy allowing properties and guests to communicate through Staying.com where compliant communications are received and processed.

errors.notNameHotelName: Please enter a valid hotel name
errors.notNameLengthHotelName: Please enter the hotel name from 4 to 32 digits
errors.notNameContactPerson: Please enter a valid contract person
errors.notNameLengthContactPerson: Please enter the contract person from 4 to 32 digits
errors.notPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.notPostalCode: Please enter a valid postal code

errors.optionalNameNotName: Please enter the name custom from 4 to 32 digits

items.title: Congratulations on completing the registration, and now it's time to relax. To help you keep records, we have sent you a registration confirmation email along with another email attached with a copy of your agreement.
